articles.description: The actor is on trial in New York over an allegation he touched a 14-year-old boy at a party in 1986.
articles.content:
Actor Kevin Spacey has taken the stand at his civil trial in New York to deny the claim that he sexually assaulted a 14-year-old at a house party in 1986. 
"They are not true," he said of the allega… [+2989 chars]

articles.author: Elizabeth Aubrey
articles.title: Taylor Swift confirms UK 'Midnights' tour is happening - NME
articles.description: Swift's next album is released later this week
articles.content:
A post on Taylor Swift’s website has confirmed that a UK Midnights tour is happening.
Fans who pre-order her new album from the official UK store will receive a pre-sale code access “for forthcoming… [+2287 chars]

articles.author: Mared Gruffydd
articles.title: Queen Camilla makes a statement in lace dress and diamond earrings worth more than £40,000 - Express
articles.description: Camilla, Queen Consort, has been pictured at the Booker Prize for Fiction ceremony at the Roundhouse, Camden, north London, looking elegant in an all-black outfit.
